title: Fix missing Gold & Silver dummy rates section and correct the User Portal logo

requirements.text: Ensure the User Portal Dashboard renders a visible "Gold & Silver Rates" dummy-data section for all authenticated users (including existing users), with dropdown controls for (1) Indian capital city, (2) karat 18/22/24, and (3) weight 1g/10g/100g/1000g, and display calculated dummy prices in INR (₹) based on the selected options.

quotes: Gold and Silver rate dummy data section are not showing.

acceptanceCriteria: When logged in, the Dashboard page shows a clearly labeled "Gold & Silver Rates" section without requiring any special user state.
The section includes dropdowns for city (Indian capital cities), karat (18/22/24), and weight (1g/10g/100g/1000g).
Changing any dropdown selection updates the displayed dummy price(s) immediately in the UI.
All displayed currency values use INR formatting with the ₹ symbol (consistent with the existing currency utilities).
The section renders reliably for existing users (e.g., the previously reported user 'abc'), not only newly created users.

requirements.text: Fix the User Portal logo so that the correct ArthaNidhi Pay logo artwork is used consistently across the User Portal UI (at minimum: header and footer), replacing the currently referenced logo asset path(s) where needed.
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo and footer logo display the same, correct ArthaNidhi Pay logo artwork.
There are no remaining references to an incorrect logo asset path (e.g., outdated filenames/locations) in the User Portal header/footer.
User-facing alt text remains English and accurately describes the logo (e.g., "ArthaNidhi").

constraints: Apply changes to the ArthaNidhi Pay User Portal only; do not modify Admin Portal behavior or integrate Admin Portal data flows as part of this fix.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text added or modified.
nonGoals: Implementing real-time gold/silver pricing or integrating any external APIs for commodity rates.
Changing authentication, backend storage, or adding new backend endpoints solely for the gold/silver dummy module.
Redesigning unrelated pages beyond what is necessary to restore the missing section and correct the logo asset usage.

required: ArthaNidhi Pay logo (clean modern wordmark + icon) on transparent background (arthanidhi-logo.dim_512x512.png)
